titleStmt.title: Kath' hyperbolen hodos. Or, The way of love, set forth in a sermon preached at Pauls Septemb: 10. 1648. Before the Right Honourable, John Warner Esq; then Lord Mayor of the City of London. By Richard Kentish, Preacher of the gospel at Katharines, neere the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Kentish, Richard, Rev.

titleStmt.title: Kath' hyperbolen hodos. Or, The way of love, set forth in a sermon preached at Pauls Septemb: 10. 1648. Before the Right Honourable, John Warner Esq; then Lord Mayor of the City of London. By Richard Kentish, Preacher of the gospel at Katharines, neere the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Kentish, Richard, Rev.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hannah Allen at the Crown in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: The first three words are transliterated from the Greek (Καθ' υπ̔ερβολτ̔̈»Ε7͵·ν οδ̔τ̔̈»Ε79·ς).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
